PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: ∼ 10 nm ).

Let's think step by step.
1. "10 nm" - Nanometer is a unit of length measurement, so "10 nm" can be considered as a property named "Size" or "Dimension" with a value of 10 nanometers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.
1. "10 nm" - Size or Dimension (Material Property) with a value of 10 nanometers.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Size or Dimension |
| Size |
| Dimension |
| Value |
| Unit |
| Nanometer |
| 10 nm |

Explanation:

* "Size or Dimension" is a property name that can be used to describe the size or dimensions of a material.
* "Size" and "Dimension" are synonyms that can be used interchangeably to describe the same property.
* "Value" is a property name that refers to the numerical quantity of a material property.
* "Unit" is a property name that refers to the measurement unit used to express the value of a material property.
* "Nanometer" is a specific unit of length measurement.
* "10 nm" is the value of the material property "Size or Dimension" expressed in the unit "nanometer".
